chunks.content:
(Global IT Program & Delivery Management)
- Worked on end-to-end full life cycle implementation of Oracle MOM Application - Version 16.01 (MOM Includes RMS, RPM, ReSA, Allocation, SIM, RIB, DI, BI Publisher, RA & ReIM) along with HRMS - Human Resource Management System - Cloud of Oracle
- Also successfully implemented Financial Systems Oracle Enterprise Business Suits (EBS) - Oracle Financials (Version 12.2.6) along with Supply chain and operation management of the complete warehouse to accomplish corporate business goals and objectives for Delta International Fashion Ltd. Co.
- Managed Integration with Oracle Micros Xstore (Version 15.0) & Coordinated with the top-most world IT organizations like Oracle and other partners / vendors in Gulf Countries and India to get the organization IT projects work implementation done successfully
- ❖ Worked as a Software Delivery Director at Sequent Asia IT Ltd., SAI-Digital (A Hong Kong based IT organization) in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam & Head of IT Services at Saitex International Ltd. (A US based, biggest denim brand in the world)
- Set up Offshore Development Center (ODC) from very scratch in Vietnam. Build a world-class finest Software Engineering IT Team of 200+ Full-Time Employees (FTEs) across multiple technologies : [Hybris E-Commerce, Microsoft Dynamics NAV 2013, Microsoft Dynamics AX CRM, Microsoft .Net, Java / J2EE, Spring, Hibernate, Oracle, BO, SQL Server, SSIS, MS Reporting, SAS, Mainframe, ETL, DW / BI, QA] related projects using Agile Scrum Méthodologies as a Head of IT Software Development accros entire organization
- Managed End to End program & delivery of all the software development IT projects (Large, Medium, Small) in above technologies
- Delivered  5  international  large  E-Commerce  program  execution  using  Hybris  platform  web  application  portal  /  mobile  apps development IT projects (Android *ios) including group of companies (2 nd  largest E-Commerce company world-wide)
- Managed 5 E-Commerce application program development for ICF International clients E2E delivery as a Director IT, Program Management -Asia Pacific from project kick-off to final implementation in all 5 countries (USA, Canada, Spain, China & Australia)
1. Delivered  Hybris  MMCN (Media Markt Shanghai, China) project for E-Commerce mobile application development in both (Android & IOS) with team size of 7 resources based out in Vietnam and New York, USA
2. Worked on Hybris Angus & Robertson (Australia) project while leading and    managing the team of 1 Program Manager, 2 Hybris Solution Architect along with the 25 members team size (13 team members in Vietnam and 12 team members based out of Valencia, Spain)
3. Worked on Hybris Wurth USA E-Commerce project while coaching and mentoring the team size of 7 resources, 1 Project Manager, 2 Hybris Technical Leads along with 4 team members in Vietnam and 3 team members based out of New York, USA, and Canada
4. Delivered Hybris Harry Rosen (Canada) project deployed their web site of Ecommerce with my core team of 9 resources based out in Vietnam, New York, Chicago USA, and Canada
5. Delivered E-Commerce Hybris, Target (Australia) project with the team of 10 resources, 7 based out in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam and 3 resources were at onsite North Geelong Australia
- Also worked as a Head of IT Service for SAI-Digital parent company Saitex International Ltd. Vietnam - Head Quarter to implement their  overall  ERP  Systems  across  entire  organization  from  13th  February  2014  to  27th  Jun  2014.  Coordinated  entire  ERP implementation in (MS Dynamics NAV & Informatica) while heading IT Department
- ❖ Worked as a Delivery Manager IT at UnitedHealth Group (Fortune #6 organization worldwide)
- ❖ Set up Gurgaon, India Captive, Offshore Development Center (ODC) of United Healthcare USA Business vertical while building a high performing Software Engineering Team from 0 to 177 billable resources as a Single Point of Contact (SPOC) from India for Global IT Program & Delivery Management position within my portfolio.
(Global IT Program & Delivery Management)

- ❖ Coordinated for transitioning  18 IT  projects  from  USA  to  India  in  15  months  across  multiple  technologies  while  building business vertical of UnitedHealth Care USA projects Offshore Development Center (ODC). Hired, Build and Managed a world class IT Team from very scratch while leading UnitedHealth Group (UHG) Gurgaon, India captive
- Achieved '0%' staff attrition  in  my  core  software  development,  IT  Infra  24*7  support  team  of  177  resources  for  3  years continuously. Not even a single resource resigned from my UnitedHealth Care India team within three years of my tenure
- Planned roadmap and business requirement into engineering deliverables, coordinating with onsite team in USA Business Segment owners (CEO, CIO, CTO, VP -IT, Director IT). Managed multiple UnitedHealth Care USA IT project staffing, Reporting and Problem Resolution, dived project execution, Created a large IT team in India and leadership for global execution team
- ❖ Worked as a Sr. Project Manager IT at Tech Mahindra European Headquarter, Milton Keynes UK for the Client British Telecom, London
- Key Responsibilities (Onsite-Offsite) of IM/KM as a Senior IT Project & Delivery Manager:
- ✽ Deputed to UK onsite for Information / Knowledge Management Portal INFORMe comprising 53 application projects for British Telecom. Χ oordinated customers at Sr. Management level including Vice President IT, CIO, CTO, Sr. Program Director IT
- ✽ Built a team of 90 for INFORMe & eAssistant project comprising 72 offshore and 18 onsite members including 18 Direct Reports (14 British Telecom Delivery Managers and 4 Tech Mahindra Delivery Managers) were reported to me directly.
- ✽ Managed multiple deliveries in tandem. Reported project status meeting to BT PMO for 53 different projects INFORMe portal
- ✽ Supervise activities of Project & Delivery Managers, ensuring regular reporting to the British Telecom PMO
- ✽ Worked with the Line of Business (LoB) Managers pan British Telecom, London Head Quarter within Openreach and supporting the client to fully utilize the IM/KM systems (INFORMe & eAssistant), identify value add changes / new additions, proactively or at Customers direction covering entire country (UK)
- Key Activities as per One IT Agile Methodologies:
- ✽ First unique point of contact for advice on h ow to progress a system change / request for new piece of work and obtain 'sign on' agreement from customer. Facilitate production of Business case as and when required.
- ✽ Requirements capture and providing value-added EG advise to the Customer. Manage customer expectations by managing priorities & resources. Planned and provided for contingencies.
- Worked with delivery team to:
- ✽ Created design specification documentation and clarify any changes to design or advice on new design & ensure all stages of testing take place. Oversee Deployment involving handover to the client & support.
- ✽ Proactively seek customer sign off. Managed post-deployment Change Requests to successful conclusion; and IM/KM products in-life (BAU). Represented Information Management programme at key forums / boards pan Openreach, BT and Customers requirement.
- ❖ Accolades : Received Appreciation Award for my excellent work performed on Ingenium project ' mylife ' developed by SOLCORP -Canada. Coordinated, delivered world class insurance product customization for India at Max New York Life Insurance Company Ltd.
- ❖ Summary : Technology Leader with more than two decades of experience including 7 years international IT experience for defining and executing IT strategy in alignment with business needs, business development, leading digital transformation with emphasis on agile transformation, automation, software/ product engineering culture and systems thinking; leading large and complex multi-year transformation programs; built best-in-class global technology operations; attracting and retaining top talent; nurturing culture of performance and innovation through capability building, collaboration and thought leadership.
